thread.title: Ozzy Parker

author: Ozzy Parker
title: Ozzy Parker
text: First of all I have to admit that customer service and delivery was fabulous!!! Me and my husband visited Home Design Outlet center in Skokie to purchase 2 bathroom cabinets. They have help us to choose the right size, design and color. Being them in stock , was another applause to them. We have received our cabinets in less than 36 hours in mint condition. Highly recommend..
